MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW11 postcode area of Warmingham, Sandbach, affecting properties in School Lane and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:04AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 5:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:58PM on 8th March 2021
